description: Authority and numbers-based hooks that leverage credibility

examples: 95% of successful entrepreneurs do this. Here's why:
Every millionaire I know does this. Here's why:
100+ top performers do this. Here's why:
After interviewing 50 CEOs, I learned this pattern:
After interviewing 100 successful people, I learned this secret:
After interviewing 25 millionaires, I learned this truth:
Study of 1000 entrepreneurs reveals this pattern:
Study of 500 high achievers reveals this habit:
Study of 10,000 successful people reveals this secret:
Warren Buffett swears by this investment strategy. Here's why:
Elon Musk swears by this productivity method. Here's why:
Bill Gates swears by this learning technique. Here's why:

patterns.template: Fortune 500 companies use this {strategy}. You should too:
examples: Fortune 500 companies use this hiring strategy. You should too:
Fortune 500 companies use this innovation method. You should too:
Fortune 500 companies use this decision framework. You should too:
